title: Big Game Hunting
description:
Mina is joined by former NFL defensive end and current host of The Green Light Pod Chris Long talk about the top teams in each conference this wacky season, and what could potentially stop each of them from winning the Super Bowl; plus they discuss the hottest coaches list.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Mina Kimes is joined by Chris Long
